title: Info Tooltip
description: InfoTooltip provides a tooltip with an information icon.

body.raw:
<ComponentPreview name="info-tooltip-demo" peekCode wide />

## Usage

```tsx
import { InfoTooltip } from 'ui'
```

```tsx
<InfoTooltip side="top">This is the tooltip content</InfoTooltip>
```
